name: Adventure Pop
description:
Embark on an epic adventure in this all-new, super-explosive bubble shooter! Ready your cannon, aim the bubbles, and fire away to burst through Adventure Pop!

A group of adventurers has come together to find new treasures, but not before running into trouble. Help Penelope find her friends but watch out for the pesky pirates!

Whether you choose to embark on a single-player journey or engage in a multiplayer bubble battle, Adventure Pop introduces an explosive experience that’s easy to learn yet difficult to master.

• Unique single-player campaign that is full of adventure and bubble-bursting fun
• Explosively fun multiplayer matches with friends or competitors
• Eye-popping visuals that combines classic bubble shooter gameplay with HD graphics
• Collect special boosters and super abilities that help you on your journey
• Unlock characters that wield unique magical powers

1 player
Network Players 2-2
14MB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
